info.name: Dark mode for lingojam.com
info.description: This style works as of October 21, 2021. Not much else to say in the description other than it works for now! If there's a update on the site, the style likely breaks like most styles on this website.
info.additionalInfo:
Send me an email if this breaks. Thanks!

-- UPDATE LOG --

21 Oct 2021 Update!
- Fixed everything, and applied this style to parts of the site I didn't find last time.
- Update log exists now.

3 July 2018: Release update
It should be working good.
